sentence: Could improve with modern refurbishments
I think time to replace the treadmills and update the free weights etc
I arrived at my room 302 the room has not been renovated since my last visits some years ago
Until the rooms has been renovated and they have stopped the ridiculous fencing off sun chairs I will not be back
If the hotel does go through some updates please re look into a more simplified shower taps system
They do have nice pools although several of them and a part of the hotels were closed due to renovation
Also at midday you are given watermelon on a stick to refresh you
The room maybe outdated but they are under renovation right now so i believe they do eager to give their very best
Hotel under reconstruction many facilities un ava
Heat up the water in the pools renovate the entrance space as well
The new renovated rooms are nice touch up
This an old refurbished hotel right on the beach in Nasa Dua area of Bali
Range was good and constantly refreshed with good brewed coffee exceptional teas and fresh juices available on request

Prior to arrival I can see that my room was upgraded to Deluxe Ocean Front was serve by Mr Rajendra try to haging for lagoon access room he tries to look for the room requested but alas all is fully booked he walked me to the room explain the maps provided where to have BF Lounge and all the benefits also explain why suite was not assign because my room newly renovated and has more beautiful view
Lovely hotel currently undergoing some refurbishments
There are significant Conrad features that will enhance your stay and the planning and the renovations that are underway convinces me that this hotel will become even better come 2020
We last visited two years ago just as the renovation programme started so it was great to see all the wonderful improvements since our last stay
We stayed in one of the beautiful newly renovated ocean suites which was amazing

They greeted me with a nice scented cold towel and to my pleasure upgraded me to a lagoon family suiteYudi one of the reservations manager made sure I was taken care of and when I told him how I would love to experience a lagoon suite he did everything he can to make it happen not only was it beautiful it was huge 140sq feet newly renovated
We stayed in the Conrad Suites and it needed major refurbishment
